txt.en: You have completed Olo Proudfoot's task
You have grown swiftly and steadily as a farmer and are now nearly ready to begin using more advanced facilities. The superior farmland awaits!

'I see that you have gained proficiency as an expert farmer! That is excellent, [placeholder]. You are showing remarkable progress.

'You are about ready to learn to be an artisan farmer, which is the next step along your path to mastery. To do this, though, you will need to prove your worth to the expert farmhand in Hobbiton.

'If you impress Olo Proudfoot, he may allow you to use the superior farmland to grow blooming crops from your artisan recipes. Not many have this honour!'
Olo Proudfoot is at the superior farmland fields in Hobbiton.\n\nYou should complete Olo Proudfoot's farming task.

'I see that you have gained proficiency as an expert farmer! That is excellent, [placeholder]. You are showing remarkable progress.

'If you impress Olo Proudfoot, he may allow you to use the superior farmland to grow blooming crops from your artisan recipes. Not many have this honour!'
Olo Proudfoot is at the superior farmland fields in Hobbiton.\n\nYou should tell Olo Proudfoot that you have successfully delivered the crops you harvested.

Crafting: A Superior Farmland
'You should speak with Olo Proudfoot at once!'

'Well done, [placeholder]! You are truly ready to begin your journey as an artisan farmer and beyond. The superior farmland can be found here, as well as in many high-level areas throughout Middle-earth. I look forward to hearing of your renown as a great farmer!'
